definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Are we the mediators that pull warring sides together?
sentences.chinese: 我们是将交战双方拉近的调停者吗？

sentences.english: It can also be flown into areas that are under fire without risk to aircrew.
sentences.chinese: 它也能在不危及飞行员生命的情况下飞进交战区域里。

sentences.english: And king Demetrius heard of it, and gathered together an exceeding great army, and went forth against him to fight.
sentences.chinese: 德默特琉王听说这事，就集合大军，去与他交战。

sentences.english: With regards to his legal battle with Datuk Seri Tiong, I can only wish him good luck.
sentences.chinese: 至于和张庆信的交战，我唯有祝他好运。

sentences.english: “We’vegone to where the guns are, ” an intelligence officer said.
sentences.chinese: “我们已经进入交战区，”情报人员表示说。

sentences.english: The fleets then squared off against one another in the course of a weekend.
sentences.chinese: 一星期结束，所有舰队将摆开阵型，捉对交战。

sentences.english: The two belligerent parties have both changed their plans for war.
sentences.chinese: 交战国双方同时调整了作战计画。

sentences.english: Many people have stayed behind in the potential war zone .
sentences.chinese: 许多人留在了可能会沦为交战区的地方。

sentences.english: A would-be defeated troops will engage his enemy first before looking for chances of victory.
sentences.chinese: 打败战的军队先同敌人交战，而后希望侥幸取胜。

sentences.english: She was always in belligerency when others belittled her.
sentences.chinese: 当别人看轻她时，她总处于交战状态。

sentences.english: The army marched into the field to fight Israel, and the battle took place in the forest of Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 兵就出到田野迎着以色列人，在以法莲树林里交战。

sentences.english: Lee also ordered the government to consider revising its rules of engagement.
sentences.chinese: 李还下令政府考虑修改其交战规则。

sentences.english: The minister of foreign affairs mediated between two warring countries.
sentences.chinese: 外长在两个交战国之间进行积极的斡旋。

sentences.english: The UN has called on both sides to observe the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 联合国号召交战双方遵守停火协定。

sentences.english: The Jedi Army of Light and the Sith Brotherhood of Darkness clashed on the planet Ruusan.
sentences.chinese: 绝地光明军和西斯黑暗兄弟会在鲁桑星球交战。

definition: to start a war/to make war/to battle against
decisive battle/to fight a decisive battle/to fight for supremacy in ...
chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
to go to war/to engage in war
